entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
